element-citation.article-title: Grading of well-differentiated pancreatic neuroendocrine tumors is improved by the inclusion of both Ki67 proliferative index and mitotic rate

citation-alternatives.mixed-citation: McCall, C. M. et al. Grading of well-differentiated pancreatic neuroendocrine tumors is improved by the inclusion of both Ki67 proliferative index and mitotic rate. Am. J. Surg. Pathol.37, 1671–1677. 10.1097/pas.0000000000000089 (2013).24121170
